| History                 = '''Project Bloodwash''' was a secret program started by [[United States of America|United States]]' Secretary of Defense [[Johann Shmidt (Earth-616)|Dell Rusk]], secretly the Red Skull who had infiltrated the American government.{{r|Avengers Vol 3 67|69}}

Situated in a secret [[United States Army (Earth-616)|U.S. Army]] laboratory under [[Mount Rushmore]] in [[Custer State Park]], Project Bloodwash was created by Rusk to kill any african/afro-american member in the U.S. Army{{r|Avengers Vol 3 67}} with a poisoned red dust.{{r|Avengers Vol 3 65|66}}

However, Skull's plan was dismantled by the [[Avengers (Earth-616)|Avengers]], who discovered that some high government member was pulling the strings behind this program;{{r|Avengers Vol 3 67}} sending his [[Redwing (Earth-616)|Redwing]] spying, [[Samuel Wilson (Earth-616)|Falcon]] finally discovered Dell Rusk's hand behind ''Bloodwash'', who then revealed himself as the Red Skull.{{r|Avengers Vol 3 68}}
